dramas.description: Insatiably ambitious residents of Seoul's most luxurious apartment throw their morals aside to achieve dizzying heights of wealth and power.

dramas.name: Hospital Playlist
dramas.description: Every day is extraordinary for five doctors and their patients inside a hospital, where birth, death and everything in between coexist.

trailer.name: Season 2 Trailer: Hospital Playlist
trailer.description: Inside the hospital, where every patient and every story matters, the five friends confront the ups and downs of life as doctors — and as human beings.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Hospital Playlist
trailer.description: A tight-knit group of 40-something doctors come together to experience the ups and downs of everyday life at the same hospital.

dramas.name: The King: Eternal Monarch
dramas.description: A modern-day Korean emperor passes through a mysterious portal and into a parallel world, where he encounters a feisty police detective.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer 2: The King: Eternal Monarch

dramas.name: Backstreet Rookie
dramas.description: An audacious part-timer who is great at her job and a well-meaning manager who is suspicious of the new hire, team up to keep a convenience store afloat.

dramas.name: More than Friends
dramas.description: Two friends navigate through 10 years of unlucky timing and unresolved feelings to find their way back to each other as adults — and as lovers.

dramas.name: Run On
dramas.description: Veering off course from his preset path, a track star follows his own pace and heart for the first time after a film translator steps into his life.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Run On
trailer.description: Veering off course from his preset path, a track star follows his own pace and heart for the first time after a film translator steps into his life.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer 2: Run On
trailer.description: Veering off course from his preset path, a track star follows his own pace and heart for the first time after a film translator steps into his life.

dramas.name: Flower of Evil
dramas.description: Hiding a twisted past, a man maintains his facade as the perfect husband to his detective wife — until she begins investigating a series of murders.

dramas.name: Hi Bye, Mama!
dramas.description: When the ghost of a woman gains a second chance at life for 49 days, she reappears in front of her remarried husband and young daughter.

dramas.name: A Love So Beautiful
dramas.description: Love is as tough as it is sweet for a lovestruck teenager, whose relationship with her next-door neighbor transforms as they grow into adulthood.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: A Love So Beautiful (KR)
trailer.description: Love is as tough as it is sweet for a lovestruck teenager, whose relationship with her next-door neighbor transforms as they grow into adulthood.

dramas.name: The World of the Married
dramas.description: A turbulent twister of lies, betrayals and revenge tears apart the seemingly picture-perfect marriage between a doctor and a filmmaker.

dramas.name: My Holo Love
dramas.description: Unexpected love finds a lonely woman when she forms a connection with a humanlike hologram who looks exactly like his prickly creator.

trailer.name: Trailer: My Holo Love
trailer.description: Holo, a state-of-the-art hologram that looks and acts human, captures the heart of a woman who has difficulty connecting with people.

dramas.name: Extracurricular
dramas.description: A model high school student who's steeped in a world of serious crime finds his double life upended when a classmate takes an interest in his secret.

dramas.name: Record of Youth
dramas.description: Two actors and a makeup artist fight to make their own way in a world that weighs the backgrounds they were born into more than their dreams.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Record of Youth
trailer.description: Fighting to make their own way in a world where money means opportunity, a struggling actor and a talented makeup artist dare to dream big.

dramas.name: Lovestruck in the City
dramas.description: Heart stolen by a free-spirited woman after a beachside romance, a passionate architect sets out to reunite with her on the streets of Seoul.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Lovestruck in the City
trailer.description: From whirlwind romances to long-term relationships, men and women experience friendship, love, heartbreak and everything in between in Seoul.

dramas.name: Do Do Sol Sol La La Sol
dramas.description: A riches-to-rags pianist who loses everything but her smile is guided by twinkling little stars to a small town where she finds hope, home and love.

trailer.name: Do Do Sol Sol La La Sol: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: A riches-to-rags pianist who loses everything but her smile is guided by twinkling little stars to a small town where she finds hope, home and love.

trailer.name: Do Do Sol Sol La La Sol: Season 1 (Trailer 2)

dramas.name: It's Okay to Not Be Okay
dramas.description: An extraordinary road to emotional healing opens up for an antisocial children's book writer and a selfless psych ward caretaker when they cross paths.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: It's Okay to Not Be Okay
trailer.description: An extraordinary road to emotional healing opens up for an antisocial children's book writer and a selfless psych ward caretaker when they cross paths.

dramas.name: When the Weather Is Fine
dramas.description: Drained from her life in the city, a young cellist moves to a quiet small town, where she encounters an old friend who helps her heal and remake herself.

dramas.name: The Cursed
dramas.description: A truth-chasing journalist goes up against the demonic CEO of an IT conglomerate with the help of a teenager with the ability to cast deadly curses.

dramas.name: Zombie Detective
dramas.description: Missing memories of his past, a zombie assumes the identity of a private detective to unravel the secrets and mysteries behind his existence.

dramas.name: Goedam
dramas.description: When night falls on the city, shadows and spirits come alive in this horror anthology series centered on urban legends.

dramas.name: Missing: The Other Side
dramas.description: A con artist encounters a supernatural village where spirits of missing persons are stranded until the mystery behind their disappearance is solved.

dramas.name: Birthcare Center
dramas.description: At the height of her career, a woman is gifted the miracle of life. The new mom heads to a postpartum care center where judgment and camaraderie await.

dramas.name: The Good Detective
dramas.description: When doubts arise about a five-year-old murder conviction, a veteran detective partners with a young hotshot to hunt down the case's hidden truths.

dramas.name: The School Nurse Files
dramas.description: Wielding a light-up sword through the dark corners of a high school, a nurse with an unusual gift protects students from monsters only she can see.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: The School Nurse Files
trailer.description: Wielding a light-up sword through the dark corners of a high school, a nurse with an unusual gift protects students from monsters only she can see.

dramas.name: Mystic Pop-up Bar
dramas.description: A young man with a unique ability begins working for a centuries-old bar owner who resolves her customers' emotional troubles by entering their dreams.

dramas.name: Do You Like Brahms?
dramas.description: While struggling to find her footing after starting later than her peers, a violin student falls for a successful pianist with a lonely soul.

dramas.name: Sweet Home
dramas.description: As humans turn into savage monsters and wreak terror, one troubled teen and his apartment neighbors fight to survive — and to hold on to their humanity.

dramas.name: Rugal
dramas.description: A police detective who loses everything to a criminal organization seeks payback when he gains special abilities through biotechnology.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Rugal
trailer.description: Equipped with special powers by an organization that engineers humans to act as weapons, a vengeful man pursues those who destroyed all he once loved.

dramas.name: Was It Love?
dramas.description: When four very different men appear in her life, a single mother who hasn't dated in years begins to rediscover love — and herself.

trailer.name: Was It Love?: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: When four very different men appear in her life, a single mother who hasn't dated in years begins to rediscover love — and herself.

dramas.name: Homemade Love Story
dramas.description: At a boarding house called Samgwang Villa, three families from different worlds find themselves entangled through love, heartache and long-held secrets.

dramas.name: Alice
dramas.description: While investigating a string of murders, a detective is stunned to encounter time travelers — especially a professor who's a dead ringer for his mother.

dramas.name: Once Again
dramas.description: Back at square one as divorcees, four siblings take another shot at love and dreams — after mustering up the courage to convince their parents first.

dramas.name: Private Lives
dramas.description: In a world where data is no longer private, con artists uncover a sinister surveillance scheme headed by the government and a greedy corporation.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Private Lives
trailer.description: In a world where data is no longer private, con artists uncover a sinister surveillance scheme headed by the government and a greedy corporation.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer 2: Private Lives
trailer.description: In a world where data is no longer private, con artists uncover a sinister surveillance scheme headed by the government and a greedy corporation.

dramas.name: Awaken
dramas.description: Police officers investigate dark secrets that link a series of present-day murders with puzzling incidents that took place in a town 28 years ago.

dramas.name: Into the Ring
dramas.description: Sold on the idea of high pay and few workdays, a spirited but down-on-her-luck job seeker throws her hat into the ring for district representative.

dramas.name: When My Love Blooms
dramas.description: A man and woman who were in love in their 20s meet again in their 40s, and find that they've both become different people during their years apart.

dramas.name: Hyena
dramas.description: To survive in a dog-eat-dog world, two rival lawyers with high-class clientele tear apart anything that stands in the way of their ambitions.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Hyena
trailer.description: No dirty trick is off-limits for cutthroat lawyers Jung Geum-ja and Yoon Hee-jae, who are willing to do whatever it takes for a big payday.

dramas.name: Oh My Baby
dramas.description: On the brink of 40 and single, a magazine editor aims to bypass marriage and skip ahead to the baby and happiness part of her story.

dramas.name: To All the Guys who Loved Me
dramas.description: Two men vie for the love of an aspiring webtoon writer who's sworn off marriage and declared herself as her only partner for life.

dramas.name: My Unfamiliar Family
dramas.description: A family that has drifted apart over the years, tries to patch up their relationship while coping with obstacles in their lives.

dramas.name: Sweet Munchies
dramas.description: To get his own TV show, a chef known for delectable late-night eats tells a major lie that complicates his relationships with those around him.

dramas.name: Graceful Friends
dramas.description: When a sudden death brings everyone’s dirty secrets to the surface, the lives and marriages of a group of close-knit friends unravel out of control.

dramas.name: Start-Up
dramas.description: Young entrepreneurs aspiring to launch virtual dreams into reality compete for success and love in the cutthroat world of Korea's high-tech industry.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Start-Up
trailer.description: Young entrepreneurs aspiring to launch virtual dreams into reality compete for success and love in the cutthroat world of Korea's high-tech industry.

dramas.name: True Beauty
dramas.description: Formerly bullied, a teen masters the art of makeup and becomes a knockout at her new school — but keeping up appearances is harder than it seems.

dramas.name: Hotel Del Luna
dramas.description: When he's invited to manage a hotel for dead souls, an elite hotelier gets to know the establishment's ancient owner and her strange world.

dramas.name: Abyss
dramas.description: After meeting an untimely demise in separate incidents, Cha Min and Go Se-yeon discover they’ve come back to life in new bodies they don’t recognize.

trailer.name: Abyss: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: Two people (Park Bo-yeong and An Hyo-seop) discover they’ve been brought back to life -- and find themselves in new bodies they don’t recognize.

dramas.name: Touch Your Heart
dramas.description: Hoping to make a comeback after a bad scandal, an actress agrees to research a new role by taking a job as a secretary for a prickly attorney.

dramas.name: Angel's Last Mission: Love
dramas.description: As a punishment for meddling in human affairs, an angel faces the impossible task of finding a soulmate for a cold-hearted ballerina.

dramas.name: Vagabond
dramas.description: When his nephew dies in a plane crash, stunt man Cha Dal-geon resolves to find out what happened, with the help of covert operative Go Hae-ri.

trailer.name: Vagabond: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: When his nephew dies in a plane crash, Cha Dal-geon hunts down the culprits with the help of secret agent Go Hae-ri. Starring Lee Seung-gi and Bae Suzy.

dramas.name: Romance Is a Bonus Book
dramas.description: A gifted writer who's the youngest editor-in-chief ever at his publishing company gets enmeshed in the life of a former copywriter desperate for a job.

trailer.name: Romance Is a Bonus Book: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: Kang Dan-i sets out to restart her career after her divorce, but finds it’s not so easy and ends up at her friend Cha Eun-ho’s publishing company.

dramas.name: The Secret Life of My Secretary
dramas.description: When a telecom executive develops face blindness, he mistakes his secretary for a wealthy heiress -- which she allows to get out of hand.

dramas.name: Doctor John
dramas.description: Unable to feel pain within his own body but skilled at diagnosing others, a pain management doctor stands up for his philosophy on life and death.

dramas.name: Her Private Life
dramas.description: An art curator's life unravels, as she tries to keep her pastime as a die-hard K-pop fan secret from her gallery's new director.

dramas.name: Rookie Historian Goo Hae-Ryung
dramas.description: Free spirit Goo Hae-ryung embarks on a new life as a scholar in the Joseon royal court after hearing about a government post for women historians.

trailer.name: Rookie Historian Goo Hae-Ryung: Season 1 (Trailer 2)
trailer.description: A prince, who secretly leads a double life as a writer in the Joseon kingdom, spars with Goo Hae-ryung, a newly appointed official historian at court.

dramas.name: Kingdom
dramas.description: While strange rumors about their ill king grip a kingdom, the crown prince becomes their only hope against a mysterious plague overtaking the land.

dramas.name: My First First Love
dramas.description: Due to various personal reasons, a group of Yun Tae-o’s friends move into his house, where they experience love, friendship, and everything in between.

trailer.name: My First First Love: Season 2 (Trailer)
trailer.description: There may be changes in the house, as Tae-o copes with news of Song-i and Do-hyeon, and Hun and Ga-rin start to see each other in a new light.

trailer.name: My First First Love: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: College student Tae-o has been friends with Song-i forever, but things get muddled when she and his friends move into his place and new feelings emerge.

dramas.name: Moment of Eighteen
dramas.description: A misunderstood loner is drawn out of his shell after transferring to another high school, where he comes across new ordeals -- and first love.

dramas.name: The Fiery Priest
dramas.description: When his fellow clergyman dies under shady circumstances, a hot-tempered priest who's unable to turn a blind eye to injustice hunts for answers.

dramas.name: One Spring Night
dramas.description: When Lee Jeong-in and Yu Ji-ho meet, something unexpected happens. Or it just may be that spring is in the air -- and anything is possible.

trailer.name: One Spring Night: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: Librarian Lee Jeong-in and pharmacist Yu Ji-ho meet in springtime -- when anything can happen. From the creator of “Something in the Rain.”

dramas.name: The Tale of Nokdu
dramas.description: While on the run for his life, a young man discovers that the best place to lie low is in a village of widows — disguised as a woman.

dramas.name: Search WWW
dramas.description: When Bae Ta-mi suddenly loses her job as a top director at a web portal company due to an underhanded colleague, she sets out to prove herself again.

dramas.name: Be Melodramatic
dramas.description: At the start of their 30s, three friends navigate the demanding entertainment industry while juggling love, careers and dreams.

dramas.name: When the Camellia Blooms
dramas.description: Dongbaek is a single mother. When a potential new love enters her life, she finds ways to defy the social stigmas surrounding her.

dramas.name: Arthdal Chronicles
dramas.description: In a mythical land called Arth, the inhabitants of the ancient city of Arthdal and its surrounding regions vie for power as they build a new society.

trailer.name: Arthdal Chronicles: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: Tagon of Saenyeok Tribe and Eunseom of Wahan Tribe contend for power in ancient Arthdal, where those who survive become legends.

dramas.name: Doctor Prisoner
dramas.description: After his career is sabotaged by the wealthy, a doctor gets a job at a prison seeking vengeance on those who are too powerful to be governed by the law.

dramas.name: Hot Stove League
dramas.description: During off-season, a professional baseball team ranked dead last in the league hires an unorthodox manager who's determined to push it to the top.

dramas.name: The Crowned Clown
dramas.description: Standing in for an unhinged Joseon king, a look-alike clown plays the part but increasingly becomes devoted to protecting the throne and the people.

dramas.name: Diary of a Prosecutor
dramas.description: A hotshot prosecutor threatens to shake up the humdrum routines of her overworked new colleagues when she’s transferred to a provincial town.

dramas.name: The Light in Your Eyes
dramas.description: Time manipulation comes with a steep price for a young woman, who becomes 78 years old overnight after using a mysterious watch.

dramas.name: Designated Survivor: 60 Days
dramas.description: When the National Assembly suffers a catastrophic attack, Minister of Environment Park Mu-jin must find a way to lead Korea through the ensuing chaos.

trailer.name: Designated Survivor: 60 Days: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: When the unthinkable happens at the National Assembly, Minister of Environment Park Mu-jin must find a way to lead Korea through the chaotic aftermath.

dramas.name: Chocolate
dramas.description: Brought together by meaningful meals in the past and present, a doctor and a chef are reacquainted when they begin working at a hospice ward.

dramas.name: Possessed
dramas.description: A reluctant clairvoyant joins forces with a brusque police detective hiding a soft heart to help him solve criminal cases using her psychic abilities.

dramas.name: VIP
dramas.description: The staff in charge of catering to the desires of a department store's top clientele try to keep their not-so-luxurious personal lives afloat.

dramas.name: Persona
dramas.description: An exploration of different personas in an eclectic collection of four works by critically acclaimed Korean directors.

trailer.name: Persona (Trailer)
trailer.description: Four Korean directors (“The Table,” “Antarctic Journal,” “The Truth Beneath,” “Microhabitat”) explore different personas played by Lee Ji-eun aka IU.

dramas.name: Black Dog
dramas.description: In a temporary position at a private high school, a compassionate teacher fights to support her students' dreams while navigating school politics.

dramas.name: My Country: The New Age
dramas.description: At the end of the Goryeo period, there were those who led the charge to proclaim a new age -- and the ordinary individuals who risked everything.

trailer.name: My Country: The New Age: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: They know that great change is brewing in Goryeo -- and they’ll need valor and power to be among the ones left standing when it’s all over.

dramas.name: Flower Crew: Joseon Marriage Agency
dramas.description: When a peasant suddenly becomes king and is unable to wed his first love, he turns to Joseon's top matchmakers to transform her into a noblewoman.

dramas.name: The Lies Within
dramas.description: After her father dies and her husband goes missing, Kim Seo-hui teams up with detective Jo Tae-sik and joins the National Assembly.

trailer.name: The Lies Within: Season 1 (Teaser)
trailer.description: When her father suddenly dies and her husband disappears, Kim Seo-hui joins forces with detective Jo Tae-sik to figure out what happened.

trailer.name: The Lies Within: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: When her father suddenly dies and her husband disappears, Kim Seo-hui joins forces with detective Jo Tae-sik to figure out what happened.

dramas.name: Crash Landing on You
dramas.description: A paragliding mishap drops a South Korean heiress in North Korea -- and into the life of an army officer, who decides he will help her hide.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer 1: Crash Landing on You

dramas.name: The Wind Blows
dramas.description: When he's diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease, a man divorces the love of his life without telling her why -- but runs into her again years later.

dramas.name: Chief of Staff
dramas.description: As a chief of staff in the National Assembly, Jang Tae-jun influences power behind the scenes while pursuing his own ambitions to rise to the top.

trailer.name: Chief of Staff: Season 2 (Trailer)
trailer.description: Jang Tae-jun may have a new title, but he's contending with the same brutal world. He's got a lot of work to get done -- and more power to do it.

trailer.name: Chief of Staff: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: Jang Tae-jun, a chief of staff in Korea's National Assembly, is determined to survive the cutthroat power games in the political arena, no matter what.

dramas.name: Legal High
dramas.description: A money-hungry lawyer and a righteous rookie become an unlikely courtroom duo in this remake of the Japanese series of the same name.

dramas.name: Liver or Die
dramas.description: A middle-aged man who devoted his life to supporting his siblings as a father figure turns to them for help when he receives a cancer diagnosis.

dramas.name: Love Alarm
dramas.description: In a world where an app alerts people if someone in the vicinity likes them, Kim Jojo experiences young love while coping with personal adversities.

trailer.name: Season 2 Trailer: Love Alarm
trailer.description: Longing for resounding proof of her feelings, Jojo sets out to uninstall the shield and make the app ring for her one true love.

trailer.name: Season 1 Trailer: Love Alarm
trailer.description: Kim Jojo, Hwang Sun-oh, and Lee Hye-yeong navigate love in a world where an app sends out alerts about how people feel -- and exposes their hearts.

dramas.name: Welcome to Waikiki
dramas.description: To finance their own film project, an aspiring director, actor and screenwriter run a Seoul guesthouse that brings antics and romance into their lives.

dramas.name: My ID is Gangnam Beauty
dramas.description: Bullied for her looks, Mi-rae gets plastic surgery hoping for a better kind of life but faces new challenges in college. Based on a hit Korean webtoon.

dramas.name: Something in the Rain
dramas.description: Reunited with her best friend’s younger brother, who’s back from a stint abroad, a recently dumped career woman begins to see him in a new light.

trailer.name: Something in the Rain (Trailer)
trailer.description: At 35 years of age, Jin-a no longer feels at the top of her game when it comes to dating. But for 31-year-old Jun-hui, age is just a number.

dramas.name: SKY Castle
dramas.description: For the families living at Sky Castle, an exclusive residential community that's home to Korea's elite, their children’s success means everything.

dramas.name: Clean With Passion For Now
dramas.description: An unexpected romance blooms between a germophobic CEO of a cleaning company and a woman not prone to neatness in this K-drama based on a webtoon.

dramas.name: Still 17
dramas.description: After waking from a 13-year coma, a woman adjusts to life as a 30-year-old -- and reconnects with a man who blames himself for what happened to her.

dramas.name: Beauty Inside
dramas.description: A top actress notorious for being a troublemaker and plagued by rumors harbors a major secret that affects her physical appearance.

dramas.name: The Guest
dramas.description: Bound together by a tragic past, a psychic, a priest and a detective join forces to take down a powerful spirit that's driven by bloodthirst.

dramas.name: About Time
dramas.description: Sparks fly between a musical actress fast approaching the end of her life span and a man who has the ability to stop her clock from ticking.

dramas.name: Encounter
dramas.description: Following a chance encounter overseas, a woman with much to lose and a man with little to his name meet again as employer and employee.

dramas.name: Lawless Lawyer
dramas.description: Seeking retribution for his mother's untimely death, a gangster-turned-lawyer exploits loopholes to bring down those in absolute power.

dramas.name: Mr. Sunshine
dramas.description: A young boy who ends up in the U.S. after the 1871 Shinmiyangyo incident returns to Korea at a historical turning point and falls for a noblewoman.

trailer.name: Mr. Sunshine: Season 1 (Trailer 2)
trailer.description: Noblewoman Go Ae-sin, who takes up arms for her nation, crosses paths with U.S. Marine Eugene Choi during a turbulent moment in Korea’s history.

dramas.name: Memories of the Alhambra
dramas.description: While looking for the cryptic creator of an innovative augmented-reality game, an investment firm executive meets a woman who runs a hostel in Spain.

dramas.name: Are You Human
dramas.description: When a prominent brain scientist and artificial intelligence expert is forced to part with her son, she creates an android robot in his exact likeness.

dramas.name: My Mister
dramas.description: In a world that is less than kind, a young woman and a middle-aged man develop a sense of kinship as they find warmth and comfort in one another.

dramas.name: Familiar Wife
dramas.description: After receiving a bizarre chance to go back in time, a man wakes up to find that his whole life — including the person he married — is different.

dramas.name: Where Stars Land
dramas.description: While dealing with the daily crises of a busy airport, two polar-opposite employees fall in love while helping each other face their own insecurities.

dramas.name: The Last Empress
dramas.description: In a modern-day monarchical Korea, a bright musical actress enters an unforgiving world of sinister secrets when she marries the emperor.

dramas.name: Partners for Justice
dramas.description: To pin down criminals and solve cases, a grouchy but brilliant forensic doctor opens up his world to a bright-eyed rookie prosecutor.

dramas.name: 100 Days My Prince
dramas.description: Upon losing his memory, a crown prince encounters a commoner’s life and experiences unforgettable love as the husband to Joseon’s oldest bachelorette.

dramas.name: Wok of Love
dramas.description: Down on his luck and in need of a kitchen, a star chef turns to reforming a shoddy Chinese restaurant staffed by former gangsters.

dramas.name: Radio Romance
dramas.description: An assistant writer for a radio program with mediocre skills manages to cast a well-known actor, who can’t say anything without a script.

dramas.name: Hymn of Death
dramas.description: During the Japanese colonial period, married playwright Kim U-jin falls in love with soprano Yun Sim-deok, one of Korea’s notable New Women.

dramas.name: Life
dramas.description: At Korea's top university medical center, ideals and interests collide between a patient-centered ER doctor and the hospital's newly-appointed CEO.

trailer.name: Life: Season 1 (Trailer)
trailer.description: A prominent hospital in Korea becomes a battlefield for opposing philosophies. Starring Lee Dong-wook and Cho Seung-woo. From the writer of "Stranger."

dramas.name: Misty
dramas.description: A news anchor at the apex of her hard-earned career contends with a younger rival after her job and a murder case that tests the limits of her marriage.

dramas.name: YG Future Strategy Office
dramas.description: K-pop star Seungri, BIGBANG's youngest member, tries to lead a team of bumbling staff at YG's Future Strategy Office in this mockumentary sitcom.

dramas.name: The Sound of Your Heart: Reboot
dramas.description: Webtoonist Cho Seok is back with more anecdotes of mix-ups, unintended antics, and bathroom blunders in this reboot starring an all-new cast.

trailer.name: The Sound of Your Heart: Reboot: Season 2 (Trailer)
The Sound of Your Heart: Reboot: Season 1 (Trailer)

dramas.name: What's Wrong with Secretary Kim
dramas.description: A vainglorious executive who seemingly has everything faces devastating news when his adept personal assistant announces that she’s decided to quit.

dramas.name: I'm not a robot
dramas.description: The prime shareholder of a financial firm is allergic to human contact, but his reclusive life is disrupted by a robot -- an entrepreneur in disguise.

dramas.name: Fight for My Way
dramas.description: A former taekwondo champion and an information desk worker aspire to chase their dreams in a world that isn’t kind to those with mediocre credentials.

dramas.name: Suspicious Partner
dramas.description: Life turns on a dime for a thriving prosecutor after meeting his new perky intern, who becomes a prime murder suspect soon after joining his office.

dramas.name: The Bride of Habaek
dramas.description: When a quest for divine stones in the human world goes awry, the water god Habaek seeks help from a psychiatrist predestined to serve him.

dramas.name: Couple on the Backtrack
dramas.description: A miserable couple on the brink of divorce rediscovers themselves when they're dropped back in time to when they first met in their college days.

dramas.name: Because This Is My First Life
dramas.description: Two housemates get married for financial convenience, but discover nothing is simple when it comes to demanding in-laws, or facing their growing bond.

dramas.name: My Secret Romance
dramas.description: A nutritionist gets entangled in a series of misunderstandings with her new chaebol boss -- who turns out to be someone she slept with in the past.

dramas.name: A Korean Odyssey
dramas.description: A self-serving mythical creature's bid for invincibility backfires when he finds himself at the mercy of a woman who can see otherworldly beings.

trailer.name: A Korean Odyssey (Trailer)
trailer.description: For a girl who sees evil spirits, the contract with a mythical being was supposed to make her life easier, not come back to haunt her 25 years later.

dramas.name: Prison Playbook
dramas.description: With his major league baseball debut right around the corner, a star pitcher lands in prison and must learn to navigate his new world.

trailer.name: Prison Playbook (Trailer)
trailer.description: No one expected a big-name baseball pitcher to actually be convicted. But now that he is, he'll have to learn to play by the rules -- prison-style.

dramas.name: Rain or Shine
dramas.description: Two survivors of a building collapse discover support and love in each other as they overcome the pain of loss and reconstruct a hopeful future.

dramas.name: Revolutionary Love
dramas.description: A third-generation chaebol falls in love with a woman who opens his eyes to the struggles of the working class and inspires him to make a difference.

dramas.name: My Shy Boss
dramas.description: The isolated life of an extreme introvert is thrown out of order when his company hires a new employee: a cheery extrovert who's not all she seems.

dramas.name: Stranger
dramas.description: With the help of a gutsy female detective, a prosecutor who has lost the ability to feel empathy tackles a murder case amid political corruption.

trailer.name: Season 2 Trailer: Stranger
trailer.description: In the midst of a power clash between prosecutors and police, Si-mok and Yeo-jin uncover murky secrets as they pursue a labyrinth of intertwined cases.

trailer.name: Stranger (Trailer)
trailer.description: The search is on for the real killer of a CEO. For prosecutor Si-mok and detective Yeo-jin, the deeper they dig, the more dangers they'll face.

trailer.name: Season 2 Trailer 2: Stranger
trailer.description: In the midst of a power clash between prosecutors and police, Si-mok and Yeo-jin uncover murky secrets as they pursue a labyrinth of intertwined cases.

dramas.name: Part-Time Idol
dramas.description: After taking a break from the business, a music producer returns with a new project in mind: launching a co-ed pop idol group.

dramas.name: Live Up To Your Name
dramas.description: Pushed together by twists of time, a Joseon doctor and a cardiac surgeon overcome their 400-year divide as they learn and heal through each other.

dramas.name: Strongest Deliveryman
dramas.description: Two gutsy food delivery workers strive to overcome their socioeconomic disadvantages to achieve big goals -- and bump into love along the way.

dramas.name: Mad Dog
dramas.description: After losing his family in a tragedy, a former detective joins hands with a brilliant swindler to hunt down ugly truths and expose insurance crimes.

dramas.name: Voice
dramas.description: A deft detective whose wife is killed by a serial murderer teams up with a rookie cop, a gifted voice profiler dealing with her own father’s murder.

dramas.name: Reunited Worlds
dramas.description: Twelve years after his death, a high school senior makes a shocking return to the lives of his broken family and friends.

dramas.name: Black Knight: The Man Who Guards Me
dramas.description: A successful executive determined to do whatever it takes to protect the woman he loves, meets a travel agent, who may be linked to his past.

dramas.name: Good Manager
dramas.description: An accountant who’s deft at embezzling funds becomes an unintentional hero to his colleagues when he gets a new corporate job.

dramas.name: Witch at Court
dramas.description: Assigned to a special task force, a headstrong prosecutor and a former child psychiatrist grudgingly unite to solve crimes against women and children.

dramas.name: My Golden Life
dramas.description: A hardworking contract worker desperate for a full-time job finds her life turning upside down after an unexpected revelation about her family.

dramas.name: Queen for Seven Days
dramas.description: In the Joseon period, a noblewoman from a powerful clan marries the Crown Prince but is deposed after only seven days as queen when he becomes king.

dramas.name: My Only Love Song
dramas.description: When things don't go her way during a shooting for her new show, a top actress runs away in an old van that guides her on a time-traveling journey.

trailer.name: My Only Love Song (Trailer)
trailer.description: Spoiled actress Song Su-jeong flees the set of a historical drama, only to slip through a portal to the past in this fantastical, time-hopping romp.

dramas.name: My Sassy Girl
dramas.description: A refined young Joseon scholar's life turns upside down after he rescues a drunk princess who later accuses him of taking something precious from her.

dramas.name: The Lady in Dignity
dramas.description: The wife of a corporate heir finds her luxurious life overturned by a mysterious woman who joins the household as a caregiver for her father-in-law.

dramas.name: School 2017
dramas.description: The popular series is back, as students contend with new problems and learn life lessons while dealing with the pressures of growing up.

dramas.name: Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok Joo
dramas.description: A competitive swimmer crosses paths with his childhood friend, a rising weight lifting star, and realizes that she has a secret crush on his cousin.

dramas.name: The Legend of the Blue Sea
dramas.description: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

dramas.name: Hwarang
dramas.description: An elite group of young warriors trained in morals and martial arts finds love and friendship in Silla during Korea’s ancient Three Kingdoms period.

dramas.name: W – Two Worlds Apart
dramas.description: After being pulled into the webtoon world created by her father, a surgical resident gets entangled in a murder mystery involving the story's hero.

dramas.name: Dr. Romantic
dramas.description: An eccentric, triple board-certified virtuoso surgeon leaves a top job in Seoul and ends up at a provincial hospital, where he mentors young doctors.

dramas.name: Doctors
dramas.description: A recalcitrant, delinquent teen girl meets a compassionate teacher, who inspires her to alter her path and become a street-savvy neurosurgeon.

dramas.name: Uncontrollably Fond
dramas.description: The memory of their painful breakup still fresh in their minds, two former lovers reunite years later as a top actor and a documentary producer.

dramas.name: Cinderella and the Four Knights
dramas.description: Catching the eye of a wealthy gentleman, spunky Ha-won gets hired to live with his three immature grandsons so she can whip them into shape.

dramas.name: The K2
dramas.description: A fugitive soldier gets swept up in personal and political intrigue when he's hired as a bodyguard for the family of a presidential candidate.

dramas.name: Marriage Contract
dramas.description: A poor, widowed woman desperate to support her 7-year-old daughter and a wealthy business executive with a sick mother enter into a contract marriage.

dramas.name: The Sound of Your Heart
dramas.description: Based on Korea's longest-running webtoon series, this comedy follows the ridiculous daily lives of a cartoonist, his girlfriend and his subpar family.

trailer.name: The Sound of Your Heart (Trailer)
trailer.description: His schoolmates thought he was a freak. His mom thinks he's good-for-nothing. But the world loves his cartoon and his hexagonal self-portrait.

dramas.name: The Miracle
dramas.description: Polar opposites in personality and looks, fraternal twin sisters who live completely different lives wake up one day to find they've switched bodies.

dramas.name: Love in the Moonlight
dramas.description: A young Joseon woman who's lived her whole life as a man ends up as a eunuch in the royal palace, where she begins to bond with the crown prince.

dramas.name: Signal
dramas.description: Communicating via a walkie-talkie that transcends time, a profiler from 2015 and a detective from 1989 join forces to tackle crimes and injustice.

dramas.name: Guardian: The Lonely and Great God
dramas.description: In his quest for a bride to break his immortal curse, a 939-year-old guardian of souls meets a grim reaper and a sprightly student with a tragic past.

dramas.name: Another Miss Oh
dramas.description: A sound director who suddenly starts getting visions of someone else’s future gets mired in the lives of two women, who happen to share the same name.

dramas.name: Beautiful Gong Shim
dramas.description: Needing funds to study art abroad, Gong Shim rents out her rooftop room to a pro bono lawyer, who begins shaking up her otherwise dispiriting life.

dramas.name: Don't Dare to Dream
dramas.description: A weather girl reunites with her old crush, a haughty reporter at her TV station. But this time, she has her eyes on someone else -- his best friend.

dramas.name: My Runway
dramas.description: An egotistic top male model and a pretty model wannabe are forced to live each other's lives until they figure out a way to undo their body switch.

dramas.name: Dear My Friends
dramas.description: Life is ever-delightful — and ever-challenging — for a group of friends in their twilight years as they rediscover themselves through love and family.

dramas.name: One More Time
dramas.description: This fantasy drama follows an indie band singer who repeatedly undergoes unwanted time slips and the girlfriend he must save from an unlucky fate.

trailer.name: One More Time (Trailer)
trailer.description: For a demoralized musician, each day is the same -- literally. To break the endless cycle, he'll have to start making some smarter choices.

dramas.name: White Nights
dramas.description: A coldhearted heiress, a man from her past and an ambitious new hire in her company all become entangled on a battleground for money and power.

trailer.name: White Nights (Trailer)
trailer.description: Even at gunpoint, she keeps her cool. For this heiress, emotions are merely obstacles that get in the way of her ambitious business goals.

dramas.name: Descendants of the Sun
dramas.description: After a chance meeting in a hospital, an ardent soldier falls for a gifted surgeon. Opposing philosophies tear them apart, but fate has other plans.

dramas.name: Reply 1988
dramas.description: Take a nostalgic trip back to the late 1980s through the lives of five families and their five teenage kids living in a small neighborhood in Seoul.

dramas.name: Oh My Venus
dramas.description: Dumped by her boyfriend of 15 years for gaining weight, a lawyer gets help from a hotshot personal trainer to get in shape and turn her life around.

dramas.name: Who Are You: School 2015
dramas.description: After losing her memory in an accident, a bullied high school orphan finds herself in the place of an identical-looking girl who's gone missing.

dramas.name: She was pretty
dramas.description: After a complete reversal of fortune and looks, childhood sweethearts reunite for the first time in 15 years as employees at a fashion magazine.

dramas.name: Blood
dramas.description: In the nation's best cancer hospital, terminally ill patients are put under the care of a group of brilliant doctors, including one vampire surgeon.

dramas.name: The Producers
dramas.description: A rookie producer joins the Korean Broadcasting System to be near his secret crush and enters the madcap world of network TV, where ratings rule.

dramas.name: The Girl Who Sees Scents
dramas.description: With help from a young woman with synesthesia, a cop who lost his sense of pain tracks down the serial killer who brought tragedy to both their lives.

dramas.name: Warm and Cozy
dramas.description: Feeling down on her luck after everything goes wrong, a woman moves to scenic Jeju-do island, where she meets a carefree chef without much ambition.

dramas.name: Hyde, Jekyll, Me
dramas.description: A chaebol executive with a split personality spars with a circus leader determined to save her troupe, which he’s trying to eject from his theme park.

dramas.name: Yong Pal
dramas.description: Operating under the alias Yong-pal, a surgeon gets enmeshed in a dark conspiracy involving a chaebol heiress forcibly put in a medically induced coma.

dramas.name: Doctor Stranger
dramas.description: After fleeing North Korea, Park Hun becomes a top surgeon in South Korea and vows to reunite with the woman he left behind.

dramas.name: Healer
dramas.description: A star reporter, a second-rate journalist and a man by the code name "Healer" are brought together by a long-buried incident that hides dark truths.

dramas.name: Pinocchio
dramas.description: In-ha and Ha-myeong become reporters for different reasons: one aspires to follow in her mother’s footsteps and the other seeks to do honest news.

dramas.name: Birth of a Beauty
dramas.description: After a nearly-fatal accident, a divorced woman undergoes a head-to-toe transformation with help from a wealthy stranger to get revenge on her ex.

dramas.name: You are My Destiny
dramas.description: A wealthy business heir marries an ordinary office worker after they have a one-night stand that leads to her unexpectedly becoming pregnant.

dramas.name: Misaeng: Incomplete Life
dramas.description: Equipped with nothing more than a GED and strategies for the game of go, an office intern gets thrown into the cold reality of the corporate world.

dramas.name: My Love from the Star
dramas.description: An alien who came to Earth 400 years ago is almost able to return to his own planet, but when he meets a famous actress, he doesn't want to go home.

dramas.name: Inheritors
dramas.description: After a chance encounter in LA, two teens from different social backgrounds reunite at an exclusive high school attended by Korea’s über rich.

dramas.name: I Hear Your Voice
dramas.description: A public defender tries to open the blind eyes of justice with help from a psychic high school boy, whose father's murder she witnessed long ago.

dramas.name: The Master's Sun
dramas.description: A woman who sees ghosts pairs with the materialistic head of a conglomerate to help each other out of jams as their hearts and lives become entangled.

dramas.name: That Winter, the Wind Blows
dramas.description: Seeing the chance to enrich himself by deceiving a blind heiress, clever con man Oh Soo just does what comes naturally -- but his plans soon change.

dramas.name: Good Doctor
dramas.description: A savant-like pediatric surgeon is in constant conflict with a fellow doctor -- a rivalry that heats up when they develop feelings for the same woman.

dramas.name: The Empress Ki
dramas.description: A woman born in Korea navigates her way through love, war, politics and national loyalties to become a powerful empress in China's Yuan dynasty.

dramas.name: The Moon Embracing the Sun
dramas.description: Years after she's assumed dead by the palace, a young noblewoman, now trained as a shaman, returns to court to reclaim her rightful position as queen.

dramas.name: Nice Guy
dramas.description: A self-made medical student and an aspiring anchorwoman find their friendship -- and their dreams -- tested by a fateful tragedy.

dramas.name: Rooftop Prince
dramas.description: A crown prince is transported 300 years into the future, where he assumes a new identity to be near a woman who resembles his late wife.

dramas.name: Dream High 2
dramas.description: A new crop of students descends on Kirin Arts High School, which has been taken over by Oz Entertainment and its own batch of aspiring stars.

dramas.name: Dream High
dramas.description: Six dedicated students at Kirin Art High School work to achieve their dreams of becoming stars in the Korean music industry.

dramas.name: My Girlfriend Is a Gumiho
dramas.description: After meeting a mysterious yet very beautiful girl, a wannabe action star discovers that she's, in fact, a gumiho -- a legendary fox with nine tails.

dramas.name: Secret Garden
dramas.description: A wealthy man and a poor stunt girl fall in love. But things get complicated when their souls become inexplicably swapped and dark secrets surface.

dramas.name: Pasta
dramas.description: Pasta follows the dreams and successes of a young woman who aspires to become an elite chef at La Sfera Italian restaurant.

dramas.name: Boys Over Flowers
dramas.description: Unassuming high school girl Jan-di stands up to -- and eventually falls for -- a spoiled rich kid who belongs to the school's most powerful clique.

dramas.name: You are Beautiful
dramas.description: Posing as her twin brother in a boy band, a young woman wins the heart of her bandmates and fans, all the while searching for her long-lost mother.

dramas.name: Iris
dramas.description: Two friends' lives are changed forever when they are recruited by a top-secret organization tasked with protecting the country from foreign threats.

dramas.name: Coffee Prince
dramas.description: Han Kyul gives his family's café a new spin, hiring only good-looking men to work there -- plus an androgynous-looking girl he mistakes for a man.

dramas.name: Full House
dramas.description: A wide-eyed scriptwriter returns from a chance vacation abroad to find that she’s suddenly homeless, setting her on a quest to get her house back.
